SPONSORSHIP

Open Source to us does not mean free. It is a model that gives the end user more flexibility and greater freedom to innovate using our technologies and redresses the balance between the software company and the customer. To help us to continue to develop Saiku we ask that all commercial organisations that use and gain benefit from Saiku enter into a sponsorship agreement with us.

The customer is free to choose the level of annual sponsorship. We do ask that the sponsorship continues for as long as Saiku is in use. all the income we receive through sponsorship is invested into Saiku, allowing us to develop and expand our product range.
